nodes.text: "Til the Spire" was a tribute song to a song that had been popular across the galaxy. In 34 ABY, the RX-Series pilot droid R-3X played "Til the Spire" on the radio station BSO 401.72 in Black Spire Outpost on the planet Batuu, telling listeners that he loved the song.

"Til the Spire" was created for the themed land Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge, which opened to guests at Disneyland Park and Disney's Hollywood Studios Park in 2019. It can be heard playing during the land's background radio loop.
